title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practice Competencies: Domain Development for Visual Instructional Design Language (VIDLs)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design the basic structure of Visual Instructional Design Languages (VIDLs) using the Domain-Specific Modeling (DSM) methodology
Learners can develop a prototype of a VIDLs graphic editor that supports both human interpretation and machine processing
Learners can analyze the theoretical framework and practical applications of VIDLs based on the separation of concerns by instructional design domains
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
